name: Celine the Nymph
description:
Click "how to play" for details. My highest score is 7820, can you beat it?

Concept art: Jinsey Smith - https://www.jinseysmith.com

Loosely based on idea from MrGamernova, winner of The Subscribers' Choice Special.

Character Templates: surt - CC0 License - https://opengameart.org/content/blowhard-2-blow-harder

Flame: Lelex Game and Art Maker - https://lelex-game-and-art-maker.itch.io/fire-animated

Bow/arrow: Kyrise - CC Attributes License - https://kyrise.itch.io/kyrises-free-16x16-rpg-icon-pack

Tileset: Buch: CC0 License - https://opengameart.org/content/happyland-tileset

Trees: Pipoya: https://pipoya.itch.io/pipoya-rpg-tileset-32x32

Forest image: DarkmoonArt_de - https://pixabay.com/illustrations/forest-tree-landscape-1699078

Sound effects: https://zapsplat.com

In-game music: David-Gwyn Jones - https://www.zapsplat.com/music/the-long-march-traditional-celtic-instruments-inc...

Menu music: sawsquarenoise - CC Attributes license - https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise/Fantasa_de_los_Pinos/04_fantas...

Victory Music: Sláinte - CC Attributes license - https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Slinte/Cup_of_Tea/slinte_-_14_-_jig_of_slurs_...

Defeat music: Ludwig van Beethoven - public domain -  https://musopen.org/music/2547-piano-sonata-no-14-in-c-sharp-minor-moonlight-son...

Celine voice: Kathy Mei

Developed by t-rev

Made with Phaser: https://phaser.io
